scripts.preversion: yarn install && yarn test && yarn changelog
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && yarn publish . --new-version $npm_package_version && git push && echo Successfully released version $npm_package_version!
scripts.cleanup: git tag -d $(git tag) && git fetch --all --tags && git clean --force -d -x && git reset --hard origin/main && git checkout main
scripts.changelog:
read -p "Changelog version: " CHANGELOG_VERSION; touch CHANGELOG.md; CHANGELOG_TAGS=($(git tag -l --sort=-version:refname)); CHANGELOG_LAST_TAG=${CHANGELOG_TAGS[0]}; CHANGELOG_COMMITS=$(git log $CHANGELOG_LAST_TAG..HEAD --no-merges --oneline --pretty=format:"  * %s"); CHANGELOG_MESSAGE=$(echo "
## [$CHANGELOG_VERSION](${npm_package_repository_url:0:$(expr ${#npm_package_repository_url} - 4)}/compare/$CHANGELOG_LAST_TAG...v$CHANGELOG_VERSION) (`date +%F`)

$CHANGELOG_COMMITS
"); (head -n 1 CHANGELOG.md;echo "$CHANGELOG_MESSAGE";tail -n +2 CHANGELOG.md;) > CHANGELOG.new.md; head -n 40 CHANGELOG.md && printf '.%.0s' {1..20} && printf '
'; read -r -p "Proceed with the changes? [y/N]"; echo; if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]];then mv CHANGELOG.new.md CHANGELOG.md;else rm -f CHANGELOG.new.md;fi; echo Done.
